column1: Hey. Take a load off. Put your feet up. Me and Satan were just aboot to go shopping for furniture. Come on, Satan.
Keep those nitrogen capsules over there by the warheads! Right. Chop-chop. Come on!
Weapons of mass destruction? Nooo! This is a chocolate chip factory. See?
Look, God, if I was gonna secretly build a chemical weapons plant, I wouldn't make it look like a chemical weapons plant, would I? I'd make it look like a chocolate chip factory or something.
Yeah. Or uh, death to the infidels?
Saddam Hussein?? Naw, relax, baby. I'm not him.
Ahh, don't shoot. I want to negotiate. Hey, relax!  Gah!
